#jQuery.loadscript ##Load debuggable Javascript scripts Load a JavaScript file from the server using a GET HTTP request, then execute it. This function looklike jQuery.getScript() but it use LazyLoad system. So you can debug the loaded file with a Javascript debugger. With Firebug for exemple... ##Author Marc Buils (marc.buils@marcbuils.fr) ##License LGPL v3 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.txt) ##Current version v0.1.0: * Initial import ##Usation For default use, load only jQuery.pluginautoload script: ``` $.loadScript( url [, callback()] ) ``` or ``` $.loadScript( url ).done( callback() ); ``` url: URL of the script to Load callback: function without paraleters, called when the script is loaded.
